bill_title: require certain transfers of funds from the state highway fund to the local bridge improvement grant fund.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require certain transfers of funds from the state highway fund to the local bridge improvement grant fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 31-2 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The secretary of transportation shall transfer on a quarterly basis from the state highway fund the sum of one million five hundred thousand dollars to the local bridge improvement grant fund created in § 32-11-38. However, if the total revenue from the fuel excise tax imposed by § 10-47B-4 and motor vehicle excise tax imposed by § 32-5B-1 in the previous year is more than three percent less than the average annual total revenue from such taxes for the previous three years, the requirement for the secretary of transportation to transfer funds is null and void until such time the total revenue from such taxes in the previous year exceeds the average of the annual total revenue for the previous three years. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
